translations: n.精益求精；细刨花，木丝（尤指用来包装易碎物体等的填塞物）

phrs.translation: 精益求精, 艾克沙修, 优质刨屑
欧洲白蜡树, 欧洲白蜡, 欧洲白蜡木, 白腊精益求精

怡东酒店, 艾克塞西尔酒店, 艾克沙修酒店, 伊克纱修酒店

sentences.sentence: Then I went to the Excelsior to make my announcement to a few hundred supporters.
sentences.translation: 随后我来到怡东酒店，向两三百名我的支持者们宣布我的决定。

sentences.sentence: Then I went to the Excelsior to make my announcement to a few hundred supporters.
sentences.translation: 随后我来到怡东酒店，向两三百名我的支持者们宣布我的决定。

sentences.sentence: Excelsior was founded in 1999 and has recently released version 6.4 of Excelsior JET.
sentences.translation: Excelsior于1999年创建，最近它发布了Excelsior JET 6.4版。
